Class ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.swing.ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions

    ColormapInterpreter

    public static class ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions
extends Object
    Helper class used to communicate the minimum and maximum values of a dataset.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

      • ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions

        public ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions(float min,
                              float max)
        Constructor for Dimensions.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value in the dataset (corresponding with the bottom end of the colormap).
        max - The maximum value in the dataset (corresponding with the top end of the colormap).
